name: AMS
description: Protects the knight against missile attacks, the first hit of any missile barrage is automatically negated. Only 1 AMS may be equipped.

name: Augur Array mk1
description: Grants a +10 bonus to awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 200m.

name: Augur Array mk2
description: Grants a +20 bonus to awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 400m.

name: Augur Array mk3
description: Grants a +30 bonus to awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 600m.

name: Auto-loader
description: Reloading is a free action for the attached weapon.

name: Cannum Pattern Core Channeler
description: This core modification allows the knight to channel its core power into its limbs more effectively. Each round the bondsman can decide to activate the core channelers to gain +15 melee damage and gain 1 heat.

name: Cannum Pattern Leg Actuators
description: This links your leg actuators to a bigger power flow to the plasma core. Every round the pilot may choose to boost his movement, increasing his tactical speed by 50% and gaining 1 heat.

name: Ceramite Plating
description: The knight becomes immune to the melta quality.

name: Command and Control Throne Mechanicum
description: This allows the pilot to affect any number of allied squads and squadrons with his command tests. He also benefits of a +10 to such command tests.

name: Coolant Fluid
description: Is consumed by a Core Stabilizer to remove 2 heat

name: Core Stabilizer
description: Can lower heat by 2, consumes 1 coolant fluid per use.

name: Damage Control
description: Grants the Knight the Damage Control trait.

name: Dueling Throne Mechanicum
description: Reduces the size penalty to jinking by up to 20.

name: Enhanced Torso Servos
description: Allows the pilot to rotate his facing up to 90 degrees whenever he is struck in melee combat as part of a parry or Jinx action.

name: Gyro mk1
description: Lowers range attack penalties from own movement by 10.

name: Gyro mk2
description: Lowers range attack penalties from own movement by 20.

name: Lifting Servos
description: Standing up is only a half action for this knight.

name: Mine Sweeper
description: Whenever a knight equipped with a mine sweeper would trigger a planted explosive, the knight’s pilot may make a Routine (+20) Perception Test as a Reaction. If he succeeds, he may have the knight back up 5 metres immediately, plus 1 metre per Degree of Success he scored on the Test. If this is enough distance to avoid the explosion, the knight suffers no Damage from the detonating mine. Any Critical Damage (including Critical Damage caused by Thresholds) to the knight’s Front Facing damages the Mine Sweeper, rendering it useless until repaired.

name: Motion Dampening Throne Mechanicum
description: Gives the pilot a +30 bonus to toughness tests to resist stuns as a result of the knight's critical effects.

name: Overcharged Ion Shield
description: Increases the Ion shield rating by 10% but lowers heat cap by 2.

name: Prey sensors Mk1
description: Grants the Preysense(1) trait.

name: Plating Insulation
description: The knight cannot gain or lose heat from attacks or environmental effects.

name: Reactive Plating
description: The knight's armour is 10% more effective against impact and explosive weapons.

name: Reinforced Throne Mecanicum
description: Protects the pilot from critical damage effects that inflict damage to him. Also protects the pilot from fall damage.

name: Rough Terrain Modifications
description: Rough terrain modifications allow a knight’s pilot to re- roll one failed Operate Test per Turn when navigating difficult terrain. The pilot may reroll tests to prevent Falling Over as well.

name: Skyfire Sensors
description: All ranged weapons ignore to hit penalties incurred by shooting at a supersonic flyer.

name: Titanic Pattern Arm Actuators
description: Increases melee weapon damage by 5 but lowers the knight's manoeuvrability by -10.

name: Co-Axial Weapon Mount
description: Attaches to a Titanic Ranged weapon allowing to mount one extra auxiliary weapon. Limit of one Co-Axial weapon per ranged weapon.

name: Humpback
description: Takes the place of the Artillery weapon slot on the carapace to increase chassis space by 5.

name: Motion Dampening Arm Actuators
description: This gives a +10 bonus to semi or full automatic ranged attacks from titanic weapons mounted on the arms.

name: Heat bank
description: Increases the heat cap of the Knight by 1.

name: Snub-nosed weapon
description: The weapon can be fired in Melee in a similar way as a Pistol, The weapons weight is reduced by 1 ton, to a minimum of 1 ton, Halve the weapons range, lose the Accurate and shieldbreaker qualities if it had them.

name: AAMS (Aegis Anti Missile System)
description: Protects the knight and any friendly vehicles within 20m against missile attacks, the first hit of any missile barrage is automatically negated. Only 1 AMS may be equipped.

name: Aegis Throne Mechanicum
description: Protects the pilot from critical damage effects that inflict damage to him and also protects him from fall damage. Gives the pilot a +30 bonus to toughness tests to resist stuns as a result of the knight's critical effects.

name: Ammunition Casing
description: Protects the Knight from weapon explosions from the attached weapon.

name: Anti-grav Plates
description: The attached weapon's tonnage is reduced by 50%, melee weapons lose 1d10 damage.

name: Artificer Hull
description: A knight with this Upgrade reduces all Critical Damage by 4, gains +10 to any Jink Actions, and incorporates the effects of either ceramite plating or reactive plating. Due to the sacred nature of the knight’s hull, all Repair Tests for the knight suffer a –20 penalty in addition to any other modifiers.

name: Artificer Torso Servos
description: Allows the pilot to rotate his facing up to 180 degrees whenever he is struck in melee combat as part of a parry or Jink action.

name: Augur Array mk4
description: Grants a +30 bonus to awareness tests, and grants 1 extra DoS on sucessful awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 800m.

name: Augur Array mk5
description: Grants a +30 bonus to awareness tests, and grants 2 extra DoS on sucessful awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 1000m.

name: Augur Array mk6
description: Grants a +30 bonus to awareness tests, and grants 3 extra DoS on sucessful awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 1200m.

name: Augur Array mk7
description: Grants a +30 bonus to awareness tests, and grants 4 extra DoS on sucessful awareness tests. Allows to scan for enemies as a half action tech-use test. Reveals enemies with lower stealth DoS within 1400m.

name: Angelus Pattern Damage Control Systems
description: Grants the Knight the Damage Control trait, allows to reroll tests to restart the knight and allows to reroll tech-use tests to prevent core meltdowns.

name: Colossus Pattern Arm Actuators
description: Increases melee damage by 10.

name: Communion Throne Mechanicum
description: Melding tests with this knight receive a +20 bonus and the manoeuvrability bonus is increased to +30. The pilot may also use the Melding skill instead of the Operate(Super Heavy Walker) skill to perform vehicle actions while melded.

name: Double Heat Bank
description: Increases the heat cap of the knight by 2.

name: Electromagnetic Cloak
description: Renders the knight untargettable by indirect fire weapons.

name: Grav Enhanced Titanic Feet
description: The stomp attacks of this knight increase their blast quality by 5.

name: Gyro mk3
description: Lowers range attack penalties from own movement by 30.

name: Gyro mk4
description: Lowers range attack penalties from own movement by 40.

name: Gyro mk5
description: Lowers range attack penalties from own movement by 50.

name: Jump Jets
description: Each jump jet allows the knight to jump up to 3m or to reduce falling damage from that distance.

name: Machine-Spirit Enhanced Reflexes
description: Allows the knight to jink one additional time each round at the cost of 1 heat.

name: Nova Pattern Plasma Ducts
description: This modification can link with equipped Plasma weapons to boost their damage by +3d10, +6 penetration. If it has the blast quality increase it by 5, if not grant it the blast(5) quality. The weapon gains the recharge quality. Each time the knight uses this component it gains 1 heat.

name: Oracle Pattern Sensors Mk1
description: Gants the Preysense(1) trait. Gives a +10 bonus to awareness tests.

name: Oracle Pattern Sensors Mk2
description: Gants the Preysense(2) trait. Gives a +20 bonus to awareness tests.

name: Oracle Pattern Sensors Mk3
description: Gants the Preysense(3) trait. Gives a +30 bonus to awareness tests.

name: Prey sensors Mk2
description: Grants the Preysense(2) trait.

name: Prey sensors Mk3
description: Grants the Preysense(3) trait.

name: Prey sensors Mk4
description: Grants the Preysense(4) trait.

name: Prey sensors Mk5
description: Grants the Preysense(5) trait.

name: Vestigium Pattern Throne Mechanicum
description: Allows the bondsman to apply the aim bonus to every ranged weapon of the knight when performing an aim action.

name: Maglock Titanic Feet
description: Allows the knight to secure itself to metallic surfaces in low gravity.
